meanings.definition: A book giving information such as facts on a particular subject or instructions for operating a device.
meanings.sent1: The handbook for the new computer had all the details I needed to set it up.
meanings.sent2: I always keep my employee handbook on my desk for quick reference.
meanings.sent3: When the handbook for cooking said to add a pinch of magic, I knew it was time to get creative.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a handbook, guiding me through the maze of her emotions.
meanings.sent5: The handbook on gardening made the process seem as easy as painting by numbers.

meanings.definition: A concise reference book providing specific information or instruction.
meanings.sent1: The student handbook listed all the rules and regulations of the school.
meanings.sent2: The handbook of synonyms helped me find the perfect word for my essay.
meanings.sent3: I used the handbook for fixing bikes to repair my old rusty bicycle.
meanings.sent4: His eyes were like a handbook, revealing his thoughts without a single word.
meanings.sent5: The handbook on birdwatching made identifying different species a breeze.
